alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 9:39PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A line of showers will impact portions of the eastern City of Chesapeake and the City of Virginia Beach through 1015 PM EST... At 938 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers along a line extending from 7 miles east of Norfolk International to near Regent University to near Northwest. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia Beach, Virginia Wesleyan University, Regent University, Great Bridge, Kempsville, Chesapeake, Back Bay, Fentress, Northwest, Princess Anne, Rudee Heights, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Pungo, Greenbrier, Bayside, Dam Neck, Hickory, Mount Pleasant and Sandbridge Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
